column5: Looking for any info on above lake ---maps---personal trip info--- walleye & pike fishing etc.

I see on Sue and Jason's Boreal Forest Outfitters face book page they bought this camp and 5 others in that area. Congrats to them they will be very busy with 8 camps now. They are are a great outfitter , very nice people. Halfmoon
Can get a depth map of Bellsmith here:https://fishingoutposts.com/lake-depth-maps/Sent from my SM-A530W using Tapatalk
Hey halfmoon do you have the list of the other camps? I don't do social media.
They bought 6 camps from Mattice Lake Outfitters - Auger, Bellsmith, Hurst, Guerin, Kagianagami and Whiteclay.
